1.title: Captain America
1.author: Joe Simon, Jack Kirby, script ; Jack Kirby, pencils ; Joe Simon, inks
1.appears_in: 8 p. in Captain America Comics, no. 1 (Mar. 1941).
notes: Introduction and origin of Captain America (Steve Rogers), Bucky (Bucky Barnes), and introduction of Prof. Anton Erskine (Prof. Reinstein) who dies ; appearance of Franklin Delano Roosevelt.
Data from Lou Mougin and Tony R. Rose via Grand Comics Database Project.

101.title: Captain America
notes:
A chronological list of Captain America stories and appearances begins below this box. Captain America stories mainly appear in:
  • All Select Comics
  • All Winners Comics
  • Captain America Comics (1941-1954 periodical)
  • Captain America (1968- periodical)
  • Tales of Suspense
    and he also appears as a character or in reprints in:
  • The Avengers
  • Fantasy Masterpieces

    Shortcuts down the list:

  • Captain America (1941- stories)
  • Captain America (1944- stories)
  • Captain America (1954- stories)
  • Captain America--Articles About

    See also

  • The Origin of Captain America

  • Barnes, Bucky
  • The Falcon
  • Golden Girl
  • Rogers, Steve
